ValidationRule.description: Merchant Services Reps shouldn't be able to change the Opportunity Status value once it has the Payment Processing DSA Record Type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Payment Processing (DSA) Opportunity" ), (ISCHANGED(StageName)), (NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL SALES ZONE 30 ANCILLARY"))), (NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,"System Administrator"))), (NOT($Profile.Name = 'NSS Manager Admin')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Opportunity Status value once it has the DSA Record Type
